title: Breaking down the question
text: Recollect the basic definition of displacement (vector whose length is the shortest distance from the initial to the final position) and distance (scalar whose length is the total length covered in reaching the final position from the initial starting point).

title: Misconception
text: Remember a vector has both magnitude and direction whereas a scalar is just the magnitude. (Use appropriate signs wherever needed)
